meanings.meaning: 1. by chance; by accident; accidentally; happen to (be, do); unexpectedly; casually Usually written using kana alone通りを歩いていたとき、私はたまたま旧友に出会った。Walking along the street, I happened to meet my old friend.
2. occasionally; once in a while; now and then Usually written using kana alone, See also たまに
偶偶 【たまたま】、偶 【たまたま】、適 【たまたま】
適: Rarely-used kanji form.

1. adaptation; accommodation; conformity

1. aptitude; aptness; suitability
1. aptitude; aptness; suitability
1. to come true (of a wish, prayer, etc.); to be realized; to be fulfilled esp. 叶うもし病気の人が千羽の鶴を折ると、その人の願いが叶うの。If a sick person folds one thousand paper cranes, her wish will come true.
2. to suit (e.g. a purpose); to meet (wishes, ideals, etc.); to conform to (standards, rules, etc.); to be consistent with See also 道理に適う, esp. 適う彼は我々の心にかなう人物だ。He is a man after our own hearts.
3. to match (implies competition); to rival; to bear (e.g. the heat) esp. 敵う, usu. with neg. verbバレエ音楽の指揮者として彼にかなうものはいない。He stands alone as a conductor of ballet music.
適う 【かなう】、敵う 【かなう】
1. to come true (of a wish, prayer, etc.); to be realized; to be fulfilled esp. 叶うもし病気の人が千羽の鶴を折ると、その人の願いが叶うの。If a sick person folds one thousand paper cranes, her wish will come true.
2. to suit (e.g. a purpose); to meet (wishes, ideals, etc.); to conform to (standards, rules, etc.); to be consistent with See also 道理に適う, esp. 適う彼は我々の心にかなう人物だ。He is a man after our own hearts.
3. to match (implies competition); to rival; to bear (e.g. the heat) esp. 敵う, usu. with neg. verbバレエ音楽の指揮者として彼にかなうものはいない。He stands alone as a conductor of ballet music.
適う 【かなう】、敵う 【かなう】

sentences.translation: If a sick person folds one thousand paper cranes, her wish will come true.
He is a man after our own hearts.
He stands alone as a conductor of ballet music.

meanings.type: Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. suitable; appropriate; fitting; proper

2. appropriately; accordingly; as required; at one's discretion 全角文字を含むファイル名の場合、一部のＯＳでは文字化けが生じることがありますので、ダウンロードの際に適宜ファイル名を変更してください。On some OS's you get gibberish for filenames with full-width characters so when downloading please change to a suitable filename.

1. no match for; cannot compete with; not in the same league as; powerless against Usually written using kana alone料理ということになれば、誰もメアリーにはかなわない。When it comes to cooking, no one can equal Mary.
2. cannot stand; cannot bear; cannot put up with; unbearable; intolerable Usually written using kana alone, oft. after an adjective as 〜て(は)かなわない私は退屈でかなわない。The boredom is unbearable.
3. unable to do; cannot do; impossible Usually written using kana alone, Dated term
適わない 【かなわない】
1. no match for; cannot compete with; not in the same league as; powerless against Usually written using kana alone料理ということになれば、誰もメアリーにはかなわない。When it comes to cooking, no one can equal Mary.
